TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INameCreationService

summary.span: 提供可以產生物件唯一名稱的服務。

span.span: Provides a service that can generate unique names for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可實作這項服務提供讓設計工具建立的新物件的唯一名稱。A can implement this service to provide a way for a designer to create new, unique names for objects. 如果無法使用這項服務，設計工具會使用預設的實作。If this service is not available, the designer uses a default implementation. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼提供範例實作。The following example code provides an example implementation. 服務可以建立以類型不符合指定的容器中的任何名稱為基礎的唯一名稱。The service can create a unique name based on a type that does not match any names in the specified container. 它也可以驗證指定的名稱字串。It can also validate a specified name string. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string CreateName (System.ComponentModel.IContainer container, Type dataType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CreateName(class System.ComponentModel.IContainer container, class System.Type dataType) cil managed
Public Function CreateName (container As IContainer, dataType As Type) As String
abstract member CreateName : System.ComponentModel.IContainer * Type -> string

param.name: container
param.span: 加入新物件的所在容器。

span.span: The container where the new object is added.

param.name: dataType
param.span: 接收名稱的物件資料型別。

span.span: The data type of the object that receives the name.

summary.span: 建立在指定容器中所有元件的唯一新名稱。

span.span: Creates a new name that is unique to all components in the specified container.
A unique name for the data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回指定的容器內是唯一的新物件的名稱。This method returns a name for the new object that is unique within the specified container. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供範例方法實作。The following code example provides an example method implementation. 這個方法可以建立根據指定的型別特有的名稱在指定容器中的元件名稱的名稱。The method can create a name based on the name of a specified type that is unique to the names of the components within the specified container. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#2)]

span.para: 通常被實作這種類型的服務，從資料類型，通常會附加數字，可讓名稱成為唯一的識別項的名稱建立唯一的物件名稱。例如，針對物件。

This type of service is often implemented to create a unique object name from the name of the data type, often appended with a number that allows the name to be a unique identifier. For example, for a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsValidName(string name) cil managed
Public Function IsValidName (name As String) As Boolean

summary.span: 取得值，指出指定名稱是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.

returns.span: 如果名稱有效，即為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the name is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作可以包含規則來定義有效的名稱的參數。An implementation of the can have rules that define the parameters for valid names. 若要驗證的名稱，並強制執行這些規則，就可以實作這個方法。This method can be implemented to validate a name and enforce those rules. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供範例方法實作。The following code example provides an example method implementation. 方法會使用字串的驗證配置，會檢查指定的字串，以判斷指定的字串是否為有效的名稱的每個字元。The method uses a string validation scheme that examines each character of the specified string to determine whether the specified string is a valid name. 此方法會傳回`true`該字串是否有效，或`false`否則。The method returns `true` if the string is valid, or `false` otherwise. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateName(string name) cil managed

summary.span: 取得值，指出指定名稱是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified name is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作可以包含規則來定義有效的名稱的參數。An implementation of the can have rules that define the parameters for valid names. 若要驗證的名稱，並強制執行這些規則，就可以實作這個方法。This method can be implemented to validate a name and enforce those rules. 這個方法很類似，差異在於此方法擲回例外狀況，如果名稱無效。This method is similar to , except that this method throws an exception if the name is invalid. 這可讓實作者，以提供例外狀況訊息中的詳細的資訊。This allows implementers to provide detailed information in the exception message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供範例方法實作會檢查指定的字串，以判斷指定的字串是否為有效的名稱的每個字元的字串驗證配置。The following code example provides an example method implementation that uses a string validation scheme that examines each character of the specified string to determine whether the specified string is a valid name. 如果字串不是有效，則方法會擲回例外狀況。The method throws an exception if the string is not valid. [!code-cpp[INameCreationServiceExample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CPP/class1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[INameCreationServiceExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/CS/class1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[INameCreationServiceExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/INameCreationServiceExample/VB/class1.vb#4)]
